title: Guacamole with Zambos Plantain Originals
ingredients: 1 family bag of Zambos Plantain Originals, whichever is necessary
instructions: Step 1: In the food processor, place the avocado, onion, cilantro, cream butter, lemon and egg. Then process until you have a homogeneous mixture.
Step 2: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Step 3: Refrigerate and serve a portion in the baskets. Accompany with the Zambos Plantain Originals.
